verbs.description: [ARG0: The U.S. and China] [V: signaled] [ARG1: a desire to avoid a costly trade war after President Donald Trump offered a lifeline to beleaguered telecom equipment maker ZTE Corp. and China ’s Xi Jinping dispatched his top economic adviser to Washington] .

[ARG0: The U.S. and China] signaled a desire to [V: avoid] [ARG1: a costly trade war] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump offered a lifeline to beleaguered telecom equipment maker ZTE Corp. and China ’s Xi Jinping dispatched his top economic adviser to Washington] .

The U.S. and China signaled a desire to avoid a costly trade war after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: offered] [ARG1: a lifeline] [ARG2: to beleaguered telecom equipment maker ZTE Corp.] and China ’s Xi Jinping dispatched his top economic adviser to Washington .

The U.S. and China signaled a desire to avoid a costly trade war after President Donald Trump offered a lifeline to beleaguered telecom equipment maker ZTE Corp. and [ARG0: China ’s Xi Jinping] [V: dispatched] [ARG1: his top economic adviser] [ARG2: to Washington] .
